Servings: 9 squares

Preparation Time: 5 minutes
Cooking Time: 10 minutes
Sitting Time: 1 hour
Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes

Ingredients:
Butter
14 ounces vanilla caramel squares
1/4 cup milk
4 cups crispy rice cereal
1 cup mini chocolate chips

Method of Preparation:
1. Heavily grease a 8 inch square pan with the butter.

2. Combine the caramels and milk in a large saucepan and cook over medium low heat until the
caramels are melted and the mixture is smooth.

3. Remove from the heat and add the cereal and toss well to coat.

4. Press the mixture into the prepared pan and sprinkle the chocolate chips over the top.

5. Let set for at least an hour or until firm enough to cut. Cut into 2 inch squares and wrap
individually.
